text: == Events == === By place === ==== Europe ==== * Sweyn Forkbeard marries Sigrid the Haughty. * Otto III reaches his majority and begins to rule Germany. * Aethelred II pays Â£16,000 of Danegeld to Olaf Trygvasson. ==== Middle East ==== * September 15 - Battle of the Orontes: Fatimid victory over a Byzantine army led by Michael Bourtzes == Births == * November 7 - Ibn Hazm, Arab philosopher (d. 1069) * Simeon, first Norman abbot of Ely Abbey * Imam Bayhaqi Scholar of Islamic Faith == Deaths == * Margrave Leopold I of Austria * Sigeric the Serious * John Weir the Great, King of the Nords == References ==
